content.raw: we don't need to add the msgs1 to this list since the `ignition_debbuild` variable is composed by the software described in `ignition_software`with explicit extra versions for the software with branches above 1. For the 0.x and 1.x series it is enough to leave the package name as it is. The only special case is msgs0. The [msgs build job for msgs 1.0.0 worked just fine](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ign-msgs-debbuilder/)
content.html: we don't need to add the msgs1 to this list since the ignition_debbuild variable is composed by the software described in ignition_softwarewith explicit extra versions for the software with branches above 1. For the 0.x and 1.x series it is enough to leave the package name as it is. The only special case is msgs0. The msgs build job for msgs 1.0.0 worked just fine
